title.rendered: “IDF Eliminates Hezbollah Rocket Unit Commander: A Step Forward in Israel’s Defense Against Terrorism”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Another targeted assassination in recent hours: The IDF has eliminated the commander of the rocket and missile unit of the western region of Radwan force.

The IDF attacked and eliminated Hussein Mohammed Mtsifha Shahuri, the terrorist who was the leader of the rocket and missile unit of the western region in Hezbollah’s Radwan unit, using an aircraft of the Air Force in the area of Kfar Dunin. Hussein was responsible for planning and executing multiple rocket firing routes towards Israel.

As part of his role, he was involved in promoting and planning rocket and missile launches towards Israel from the central and western region of Lebanon.

Also killed in the attack was Mahmoud Ibrahim Fedlallah, an activist in the rocket and missile unit of Hezbollah terrorist organization.

Attached is footage from the assassination in the area of Kfar Dunin: https://bit.ly/4aZmiJZ
